Class PdfColor

java.lang.Object
  com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfObject
      com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfArray
          com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfColor

 class PdfColor
extends PdfArray

A PdfColor defines a BaseColor (it's a PdfArray containing 3 values).

See Also:
PdfDictionary
